name: glad
description: Multi-Language Vulkan/GL/GLES/EGL/GLX/WGL Loader-Generator based on the official specs.

features.name: core-profile
features.description: Uses `core` profile instead of `compatibility`.

features.name: egl
features.description: Use `egl` spec instead of `gl`.

features.name: wgl
features.description: Use `wgl` spec instead of `gl`.

features.name: glx
features.description: Use `glx` spec instead of `gl`.

features.name: no-loader
features.description: Disable generation of loader logic.

features.name: extensions
features.description: Enables all extensions.

features.name: gl-api-latest
features.description: Imports extensions from latest OpenGL API specification version.

features.name: gl-api-10
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 1.0.

features.name: gl-api-11
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 1.1.

features.name: gl-api-12
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 1.2.

features.name: gl-api-13
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 1.3.

features.name: gl-api-14
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 1.4.

features.name: gl-api-15
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 1.5.

features.name: gl-api-20
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 2.0.

features.name: gl-api-21
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 2.1.

features.name: gl-api-30
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 3.0.

features.name: gl-api-31
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 3.1.

features.name: gl-api-32
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 3.2.

features.name: gl-api-33
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 3.3.

features.name: gl-api-40
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 4.0.

features.name: gl-api-41
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 4.1.

features.name: gl-api-42
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 4.2.

features.name: gl-api-43
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 4.3.

features.name: gl-api-44
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 4.4.

features.name: gl-api-45
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 4.5.

features.name: gl-api-46
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL API specification version 4.6.

features.name: gles-api-latest
features.description: Imports extensions from latest OpenGL ES specification.

features.name: gles-api-10
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL ES specification version 1.0.

features.name: gles2-api-latest
features.description: Imports extensions from latest OpenGL (ES) specification.

features.name: gles2-api-20
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL (ES) specification version 2.0.

features.name: gles2-api-30
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL (ES) specification version 3.0.

features.name: gles2-api-31
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL (ES) specification version 3.1.

features.name: gles2-api-32
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL (ES) specification version 3.2.

features.name: glsc2-api-latest
features.description: Imports extensions from latest OpenGL SC API specification.

features.name: glsc2-api-20
features.description: Imports extensions from OpenGL SC API specification version 2.0.
